ai-tha-ap276:1.2_0: free of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-tha-ap276:1.3_0: whose mind is like the space
ai-tha-ap276:2.3_0: I’ve given a slave to you.
ai-tha-ap276:2.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap276:3.1_0: Afterwards these people in the next life
ai-tha-ap276:3.2_0: At the Añjana grove at that time,
ai-tha-ap276:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap276:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Visākhā.
